name: Toners 3
short_description:
-keeps a database recording all your media files
-no buttons, just right-click to access the options
-play single file or the full list from the first record or from the selected record
-resume, pause , stop are as usual inclusions
-add media (tones) or edit, remove, update
-rating a tone as "5" make it Favorite automatically
-search tones based on name, rating, genre, description
-description field is customised allowing you to write anything .. for eg. authors name...when  you will search by description, write the author's name you will get those media records which are saved with the same description
-search and play the list ... after that click on Refresh option to show all the records
-Simple Designed UI  ------- the playlist is the window
-Move the window in your convenient position....Toners 3 can remember the position next time
-you can see video of your movie, videos songs, mobile captured video by clicking "Show Video"
-Starts in Desktop as Widget...
summary: Toners 3 is a tool which store all media files in a arranged manner
